players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
You: "Bob: I know Alice was the mafioso and I'm the detective. We need to be careful, as there might be more than one mafioso among us."

Diana: "I'm starting to suspect that one of the mafiosos might be among us, trying to hide in plain sight. Let's make sure we remain vigilant and vote wisely based on our observations and suspicions."

Charlie: "I believe Alice's death was an unfortunate accident, but it's important that we all remain vigilant and work together to ensure the safety of our village. Let's trust each other and make informed decisions based on evidence and observation."
